mn118:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati pubbārāme migāramātupāsāde sambahulehi abhiññātehi abhiññātehi therehi sāvakehi saddhiṁ—
mn118:1.3_0: āyasmatā ca sāriputtena āyasmatā ca mahāmoggallānena āyasmatā ca mahākassapena āyasmatā ca mahākaccāyanena āyasmatā ca mahākoṭṭhikena āyasmatā ca mahākappinena āyasmatā ca mahācundena āyasmatā ca anuruddhena āyasmatā ca revatena āyasmatā ca ānandena,
mn118:1.3_1: aññehi ca abhiññātehi abhiññātehi therehi sāvakehi saddhiṁ.
mn118:2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena therā bhikkhū nave bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti.
mn118:2.2_0: Appekacce therā bhikkhū dasapi bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti,
mn118:2.2_1: appekacce therā bhikkhū vīsampi bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti,
mn118:2.2_2: appekacce therā bhikkhū tiṁsampi bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti,
mn118:2.2_3: appekacce therā bhikkhū cattārīsampi bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti.
mn118:2.3_0: Te ca navā bhikkhū therehi bhikkhūhi ovadiyamānā anusāsiyamānā uḷāraṁ pubbenāparaṁ visesaṁ jānanti.
mn118:3.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā tadahuposathe pannarase pavāraṇāya puṇṇāya puṇṇamāya rattiyā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto abbhokāse nisinno hoti.
mn118:3.2_0: Atha kho bhagavā tuṇhībhūtaṁ tuṇhībhūtaṁ bhikkhusaṅghaṁ anuviloketvā bhikkhū āmantesi:
mn118:4.3_1: bhiyyoso mattāya vīriyaṁ ārabhatha appattassa pattiyā, anadhigatassa adhigamāya,
mn118:5.2_0: “bhagavā kira tattheva sāvatthiyaṁ komudiṁ cātumāsiniṁ āgamessatī”ti.
mn118:5.3_0: Te jānapadā bhikkhū sāvatthiṁ osaranti bhagavantaṁ dassanāya.
mn118:6.1_0: Te ca kho therā bhikkhū bhiyyoso mattāya nave bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti.
mn118:6.2_0: Appekacce therā bhikkhū dasapi bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti,
mn118:6.2_1: appekacce therā bhikkhū vīsampi bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti,
mn118:6.2_2: appekacce therā bhikkhū tiṁsampi bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti,
mn118:6.2_3: appekacce therā bhikkhū cattārīsampi bhikkhū ovadanti anusāsanti.
mn118:6.3_0: Te ca navā bhikkhū therehi bhikkhūhi ovadiyamānā anusāsiyamānā uḷāraṁ pubbenāparaṁ visesaṁ jānanti.
mn118:7.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā tadahuposathe pannarase komudiyā cātumāsiniyā puṇṇāya puṇṇamāya rattiyā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto abbhokāse nisinno hoti.
mn118:7.2_0: Atha kho bhagavā tuṇhībhūtaṁ tuṇhībhūtaṁ bhikkhusaṅghaṁ anuviloketvā bhikkhū āmantesi:
mn118:8.1_0: “Apalāpāyaṁ, bhikkhave, parisā; nippalāpāyaṁ, bhikkhave, parisā; suddhā sāre patiṭṭhitā.
mn118:8.2_0: Tathārūpo ayaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhusaṅgho; tathārūpā ayaṁ, bhikkhave, parisā
mn118:8.3_0: yathārūpā parisā āhuneyyā pāhuneyyā dakkhiṇeyyā añjalikaraṇīyā anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassa.
mn118:8.4_0: Tathārūpo ayaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhusaṅgho; tathārūpā ayaṁ, bhikkhave, parisā
mn118:8.5_0: yathārūpāya parisāya appaṁ dinnaṁ bahu hoti, bahu dinnaṁ bahutaraṁ.
mn118:8.6_0: Tathārūpo ayaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhusaṅgho; tathārūpā ayaṁ, bhikkhave, parisā
mn118:8.8_0: Tathārūpo ayaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhusaṅgho; tathārūpā ayaṁ, bhikkhave, parisā
mn118:8.9_0: yathārūpaṁ parisaṁ alaṁ yojanagaṇanāni dassanāya gantuṁ puṭosenāpi.
mn118:9.1_1: bhikkhū imasmiṁ bhikkhusaṅghe arahanto khīṇāsavā vusitavanto katakaraṇīyā ohitabhārā anuppattasadatthā parikkhīṇabhavasaṁyojanā sammadaññāvimuttā—
mn118:10.1_1: bhikkhū imasmiṁ bhikkhusaṅghe pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā opapātikā tattha parinibbāyino anāvattidhammā tasmā lokā—
mn118:11.1_1: bhikkhū imasmiṁ bhikkhusaṅghe tiṇṇaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā rāgadosamohānaṁ tanuttā sakadāgāmino sakideva imaṁ lokaṁ āgantvā dukkhassantaṁ karissanti—
mn118:12.1_1: bhikkhū imasmiṁ bhikkhusaṅghe tiṇṇaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā sotāpannā avinipātadhammā niyatā sambodhiparāyanā—
mn118:13.1_1: bhikkhū imasmiṁ bhikkhusaṅghe catunnaṁ satipaṭṭhānānaṁ bhāvanānuyogamanuyuttā viharanti—
mn118:14.1_1: bhikkhū imasmiṁ bhikkhusaṅghe catunnaṁ sammappadhānānaṁ bhāvanānuyogamanuyuttā viharanti …pe…
mn118:15.3_0: Cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā bahulīkatā satta bojjhaṅge paripūrenti.
mn118:15.4_0: Satta bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā bahulīkatā vijjāvimuttiṁ paripūrenti.
mn118:16.1_1: ānāpānassati kathaṁ bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṁsā?
mn118:17.1_1: bhikkhu araññagato vā rukkhamūlagato vā suññāgāragato vā nisīdati pallaṅkaṁ ābhujitvā ujuṁ kāyaṁ paṇidhāya parimukhaṁ satiṁ upaṭṭhapetvā.
mn118:22.1_1: ānāpānassati evaṁ bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṁsā.
mn118:23.1_1: ānāpānassati kathaṁ bahulīkatā cattāro satipaṭṭhāne paripūreti?
mn118:24.1_1: bhikkhu dīghaṁ vā assasanto ‘dīghaṁ assasāmī’ti pajānāti,
mn118:24.5_1: tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhu viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ.
mn118:24.7_1: kāye kāyānupassī tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhu viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ.
mn118:25.5_1: tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhu viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ.
mn118:25.7_1: vedanāsu vedanānupassī tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhu viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ.
mn118:26.5_1: tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhu viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ.
mn118:26.7_1: citte cittānupassī tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhu viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ.
mn118:27.5_1: tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhu viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ.
mn118:27.6_0: So yaṁ taṁ abhijjhādomanassānaṁ pahānaṁ taṁ paññāya disvā sādhukaṁ ajjhupekkhitā hoti.
mn118:27.7_1: dhammesu dhammānupassī tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhu viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ.
mn118:28.1_1: ānāpānassati evaṁ bahulīkatā cattāro satipaṭṭhāne paripūreti.
mn118:29.1_1: cattāro satipaṭṭhānā kathaṁ bahulīkatā satta bojjhaṅge paripūrenti?
mn118:30.1_1: bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ,
mn118:30.1_2: upaṭṭhitāssa tasmiṁ samaye sati hoti asammuṭṭhā.
mn118:30.2_2: satisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti.
mn118:30.2_4: satisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati.
mn118:31.1_0: So tathāsato viharanto taṁ dhammaṁ paññāya pavicinati pavicayati parivīmaṁsaṁ āpajjati.
mn118:31.2_1: bhikkhu tathāsato viharanto taṁ dhammaṁ paññāya pavicinati pavicayati parivīmaṁsaṁ āpajjati,
mn118:31.2_2: dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti,
mn118:31.2_4: dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati.
mn118:32.1_0: Tassa taṁ dhammaṁ paññāya pavicinato pavicayato parivīmaṁsaṁ āpajjato āraddhaṁ hoti vīriyaṁ asallīnaṁ.
mn118:32.2_1: bhikkhuno taṁ dhammaṁ paññāya pavicinato pavicayato parivīmaṁsaṁ āpajjato āraddhaṁ hoti vīriyaṁ asallīnaṁ,
mn118:32.2_2: vīriyasambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti,
mn118:32.2_4: vīriyasambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati.
mn118:33.2_2: pītisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti,
mn118:33.2_4: pītisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati.
mn118:34.2_1: bhikkhuno pītimanassa kāyopi passambhati, cittampi passambhati,
mn118:34.2_2: passaddhisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti,
mn118:34.2_4: passaddhisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati.
mn118:35.2_2: samādhisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti,
mn118:35.2_4: samādhisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati.
mn118:36.1_0: So tathāsamāhitaṁ cittaṁ sādhukaṁ ajjhupekkhitā hoti.
mn118:36.2_1: bhikkhu tathāsamāhitaṁ cittaṁ sādhukaṁ ajjhupekkhitā hoti,
mn118:36.2_2: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti,
mn118:36.2_4: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati.
mn118:38.2_0: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ,
mn118:38.2_1: upaṭṭhitāssa tasmiṁ samaye sati hoti asammuṭṭhā.
mn118:38.3_2: satisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti,
mn118:38.3_4: satisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati.
mn118:38.4_0: So tathāsato viharanto taṁ dhammaṁ paññāya pavicinati pavicayati parivīmaṁsaṁ āpajjati.
mn118:38.5_1: bhikkhu tathāsato viharanto taṁ dhammaṁ paññāya pavicinati pavicayati parivīmaṁsaṁ āpajjati,
mn118:38.5_2: dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti,
mn118:38.5_4: dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati.
mn118:38.6_0: Tassa taṁ dhammaṁ paññāya pavicinato pavicayato parivīmaṁsaṁ āpajjato āraddhaṁ hoti vīriyaṁ asallīnaṁ.
mn118:38.7_1: bhikkhuno taṁ dhammaṁ paññāya pavicinato pavicayato parivīmaṁsaṁ āpajjato āraddhaṁ hoti vīriyaṁ asallīnaṁ,
mn118:38.7_2: vīriyasambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti,
mn118:38.7_4: vīriyasambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati.
mn118:38.9_2: pītisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti,
mn118:38.9_4: pītisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati.
mn118:38.11_1: bhikkhuno pītimanassa kāyopi passambhati, cittampi passambhati,
mn118:38.11_2: passaddhisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti,
mn118:38.11_4: passaddhisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati.
mn118:38.13_2: samādhisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti,
mn118:38.13_4: samādhisambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati.
mn118:39.1_0: So tathāsamāhitaṁ cittaṁ sādhukaṁ ajjhupekkhitā hoti.
mn118:39.2_1: bhikkhu tathāsamāhitaṁ cittaṁ sādhukaṁ ajjhupekkhitā hoti,
mn118:39.2_2: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno āraddho hoti,
mn118:39.2_4: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo tasmiṁ samaye bhikkhuno bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati.
mn118:40.1_1: cattāro satipaṭṭhānā evaṁ bahulīkatā satta sambojjhaṅge paripūrenti.
mn118:41.1_1: satta bojjhaṅgā kathaṁ bahulīkatā vijjāvimuttiṁ paripūrenti?
mn118:42.1_1: bhikkhu satisambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ.
mn118:42.7_0: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ.
mn118:43.1_1: satta bojjhaṅgā evaṁ bahulīkatā vijjāvimuttiṁ paripūrentī”ti.
mn118:43.3_0: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
